title: Chris Oldmeadow
text:
Chris Oldmeadow



Iâ€™m a biostatistician and data scientist who works with clinicians and researchers to transform data into insights that improve health care and outcomes.
My work focuses on the design of high-quality, innovative studies, with a strong emphasis on methodological rigour, collaboration, and real-world impact.

title: About
text:
Professional Summary
Associate Professor Oldmeadow is an experienced applied statistician with a strong record of statistical leadership in clinical trials and health data science. He is Head of Research Design at the Hunter Medical Research Institute.

title: About
text:
Education

PhD in Statistics, Queensland University of Technology, 2009

B Mathematics (Honours), University of Newcastle, 2005

title: About
text:
Research Interests

Causal Modelling

Bayesian Adaptive Trials

Pragmatic Trials

Predictive Modelling
